sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - இன்பமாயிரு, நேசி, பிணைப்படு, பிணைப்படுகிற, பிரியமாயிரு, உத்திரவாதியாயிரு
to pledge, to exchange, to mortgage, to engage, to occupy, to undertake for, to give pledges, to be (or to become) surety, to take on a pledge, to give in pledge
1) to take on a pledge, to go surety for, to guarantee
2) to have fellowship with, to share

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to braid, that is, intermix; technically to traffic (as if by barter); also to give or be security (as a kind of exchange): - engage, (inter-) meddle (with), mingle (self), mortgage, occupy, give pledges, be (-come, put in) surety, undertake.
Cognate: H4627, H6148, H6161, H6162, H8594
